Suggested Use: 1 to 2 tablets as desired 30 to 60 minutes before going to sleep. Do not exceed directed use. WARNING: USE ONLY AT BEDTIME. For adult use only. Not for use by children, teenagers, or women who are pregnant, may become pregnant, or breastfeeding. If you are under medical supervision, or have an autoimmune disease, diabetes, a depressive disorder, a thyroid condition, epilepsy, leukemia, or a lymphoproliferative disorder, or are taking MAO inhibitor drugs or corticosteroids such as cortisone or prednisone, consult your physician before using this product.
